title: 醫學院學生壓力及學習生活意見調查
description: Survey on the Stress Level and Learning Experience of CUHK Medical Students

title: 你覺得此刻的壓力指數是(1-7)?
description: What is your current level of stress, on a scale of 1-7?

title: 你的壓力主要來自？(可選多於一項) What is the main source of your stress? (You may choose more than one option.)
choices: 自己的期望 Expectations towards self

title: 你平均每星期花多少時間溫習？How much time do you spend on revision every week?
你覺得在考試前夕(一個月內)的壓力指數平均是？
description: What is your AVERAGE level of stress in the month before exams?

title: 你覺得在考試前夕(一個月內)的壓力指數最大是？
description: What is your MAXIMUM level of stress in the month before exams?

title: 承上題，何時壓力最大？
description: Further to the above question, when did you feel the most stressed?

title: 你有多擔心自己考試不合格？
description: How worried are you about failing the exam?

title: 你感到有壓力時會與何人分擔？(可選多於一項)
description: Who would you share your feelings with when you feel stressed? (You may choose more than one option.)

title: 你感到有壓力時會與何人分擔？(可選多於一項)
description: Who would you share your feelings with when you feel stressed? (You may choose more than one option.)

title: 你會如何減壓？(可選多於一項)
description: How do you relieve your stress? (You may choose more than one option.)
choices: 與人聊天 Chat with someone

title: 你有多滿意現在的教學模式？(1-7)
description: How satisfied are you, on a scale of 1-7, with the current mode of teaching and learning?

title: 你是否直接入讀Year 2? Did you directly enter Year 2?
姓名 Name (Optional)
description: All answers you provided above will be kept anonymous and confidential. The sole purpose of collecting your name is for us to follow up on your thoughts/suggestions if necessary. You may feel free to leave this blank too :)
